about.summary: Development headers and libraries for Clang

name: libclang
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.20.5
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
    name: libclang
    version: 11.0.0
source:
    -   folder: .
        patches:
            - patches/0001-Find-conda-gcc-installation.patch
            - patches/0001-Set-VERSION-in-osx-as-well.patch
            - patches/0002-Fix-sysroot-detection-for-linux.patch
            - patches/0002-clang-add-conda-specific-env-var-CONDA_BUILD_SYSROOT.patch
            - patches/0003-clang-Fix-normalizeProgramName-s-handling-of-dots-ou.patch
            - patches/cross-compile.diff
        sha256: 0f96acace1e8326b39f220ba19e055ba99b0ab21c2475042dbc6a482649c5209
        url: https://github.com/llvm/llvm-project/releases/download/llvmorg-11.0.0/clang-11.0.0.src.tar.xz
    -   folder: tools/extra
        sha256: fed318f75d560d0e0ae728e2fb8abce71e9d0c60dd120c9baac118522ce76c09
        url: https://github.com/llvm/llvm-project/releases/download/llvmorg-11.0.0/clang-tools-extra-11.0.0.src.tar.xz
build:
    number: 2
    string: default_hf0ebb0c_2
    track_features: null
requirements:
    build:
        - _libgcc_mutex 0.1 conda_forge
        - _openmp_mutex 4.5 1_gnu
        - binutils_impl_linux-64 2.35.1 h17ad2fc_0
        - binutils_impl_linux-ppc64le 2.35.1 h3cfad43_0
        - binutils_linux-ppc64le 2.35 h67c3c8d_29
        - bzip2 1.0.8 h516909a_3
        - c-ares 1.16.1 h516909a_3
        - ca-certificates 2020.11.8 ha878542_0
        - cmake 3.18.4 h1f3970d_0
        - expat 2.2.9 he1b5a44_2
        - gcc_impl_linux-64 8.4.0 hb19a595_17
        - gcc_impl_linux-ppc64le 8.4.0 h6b55dda_17
        - gcc_linux-ppc64le 8.4.0 hf7723c3_29
        - gxx_impl_linux-64 8.4.0 hd716dad_17
        - gxx_impl_linux-ppc64le 8.4.0 h314cf42_17
        - gxx_linux-ppc64le 8.4.0 he30fffb_29
        - kernel-headers_linux-64 2.6.32 h77966d4_13
        - kernel-headers_linux-ppc64le 3.10.0 hbe0c576_10
        - krb5 1.17.2 h926e7f8_0
        - ld_impl_linux-64 2.35.1 hed1e6ac_0
        - ld_impl_linux-ppc64le 2.35.1 h9c2cf76_0
        - libcurl 7.71.1 hcdd3856_8
        - libedit 3.1.20191231 he28a2e2_2
        - libev 4.33 h516909a_1
        - libgcc-devel_linux-64 8.4.0 h3b9816e_17
        - libgcc-devel_linux-ppc64le 8.4.0 hbb93445_17
        - libgcc-ng 9.3.0 h5dbcf3e_17
        - libgomp 9.3.0 h5dbcf3e_17
        - libllvm11 11.0.0 he513fc3_0
        - libnghttp2 1.41.0 h8cfc5f6_2
        - libssh2 1.9.0 hab1572f_5
        - libstdcxx-devel_linux-64 8.4.0 h4084dd6_17
        - libstdcxx-devel_linux-ppc64le 8.4.0 h20c6264_17
        - libstdcxx-ng 9.3.0 h2ae2ef3_17
        - libuv 1.40.0 hd18ef5c_0
        - llvm-tools 11.0.0 he513fc3_0
        - llvmdev 11.0.0 he513fc3_0
        - make 4.3 hd18ef5c_1
        - ncurses 6.2 h58526e2_4
        - openssl 1.1.1h h516909a_0
        - rhash 1.3.6 h516909a_1001
        - sysroot_linux-64 2.12 h77966d4_13
        - sysroot_linux-ppc64le 2.17 h8b29623_10
        - tk 8.6.10 hed695b0_1
        - xz 5.2.5 h516909a_1
        - zlib 1.2.11 h516909a_1010
    host:
        - _libgcc_mutex 0.1 conda_forge
        - _openmp_mutex 4.5 1_gnu
        - clang 11.0.0 ha3edaa6_2
        - libgcc-ng 9.3.0 hb998004_17
        - libgomp 9.3.0 hb998004_17
        - libllvm11 11.0.0 h7a68d89_0
        - libstdcxx-ng 9.3.0 h42fc837_17
        - llvm 11.0.0 hd38ee23_0
        - llvm-tools 11.0.0 h7a68d89_0
        - llvmdev 11.0.0 h7a68d89_0
        - zlib 1.2.11 h6eb9509_1010
    run:
        - libgcc-ng >=8.4.0
        - libllvm11 >=11.0.0,<11.1.0a0
        - libstdcxx-ng >=8.4.0
test:
    commands:
        - test -f "$PREFIX/lib/libclang.so"
        - test -f "$PREFIX/lib/libclang.so.11"
about:
    home: http://llvm.org/
    license: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception
    license_family: Apache
    license_file: LICENSE.TXT
    summary: Development headers and libraries for Clang
extra:
    copy_test_source_files: true
    final: true
    recipe-maintainers:
        - SylvainCorlay
        - chrisburr
        - inducer
        - isuruf
        - jakirkham
        - timsnyder
